meaningMnemonic: <radical>Loiter</radical>ing around with a <radical>brush</radical>? Sorry, but you're breaking the <kanji>law</kanji>. If you have a brush, that's okay. If you're loitering, that's okay. If you combine the two? Well... watch your back.
readingMnemonic: Where were you loitering with your brush, breaking the <kanji>law</kanji>? Right outside the <reading>Ritz</reading> (りつ) Hotel. You'd think that it would be okay since you were staying there, but the law is the law.
